form_fields.label: Reason of Hospitalization
form_fields.description: What is the cause that lead to the patient being hospitalized? Why did they come to the hospital?

form_fields.label: What is the history of the patient's illness?
form_fields.description: What are the symptoms that the patient was feeling? What is the history of the illness? What are their symptoms?

form_fields.label: Habitual Treatment
form_fields.description: What is the patient's habitual treatment medication

form_fields.label: Habitual Treatment (text)
form_fields.description: Describe the patient's habitual treatment in text

form_fields.label: Specific procedure needed to take the medication
form_fields.description: Does the patient take a certain medication that needs a specific procedure before being ingested?

form_fields.label: Blood tests brought by the patient
form_fields.description: What do the tests brought by the patient show?

form_fields.label: imaging tests brought by the patient
form_fields.description: What are the imaging results that the patient has brought with them

form_fields.label: Documents brought by the patient
form_fields.description: What sort of documents did the patient bring with them
